com.jayway.jsonpath.internal

类 JsonContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.jsonpath.internal.JsonContext
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DocumentContext, ReadContext, WriteContext

    public class JsonContext
extends Object
implements DocumentContext

      • add

        public DocumentContext add(String path,
                           Object value,
                           Predicate... filters)
        从接口复制的说明: WriteContext
        Add value to array 
         
 List array = new ArrayList(){{
      add(0);
      add(1);
 }};

 JsonPath.parse(array).add("$", 2);

 assertThat(array).containsExactly(0,1,2);
        指定者:
        add 在接口中 WriteContext
        参数:
        path - path to array
        value - value to add
        filters - filters
        返回:
        a document context

      • put

        public DocumentContext put(String path,
                           String key,
                           Object value,
                           Predicate... filters)
        从接口复制的说明: WriteContext
        Add or update the key with a the given value at the given path
        指定者:
        put 在接口中 WriteContext
        参数:
        path - path to object
        key - key to add
        value - value of key
        filters - filters
        返回:
        a document context

      • renameKey

        public DocumentContext renameKey(String path,
                                 String oldKeyName,
                                 String newKeyName,
                                 Predicate... filters)
        从接口复制的说明: WriteContext
        Renames the last key element of a given path.
        指定者:
        renameKey 在接口中 WriteContext
        参数:
        path - The path to the old key. Should be resolved to a map or an array including map items.
        oldKeyName - The old key name.
        newKeyName - The new key name.
        filters - filters.
        返回:
        a document content.

      • renameKey

        public DocumentContext renameKey(JsonPath path,
                                 String oldKeyName,
                                 String newKeyName)
        从接口复制的说明: WriteContext
        Renames the last key element of a given path.
        指定者:
        renameKey 在接口中 WriteContext
        参数:
        path - The path to the old key. Should be resolved to a map or an array including map items.
        oldKeyName - The old key name.
        newKeyName - The new key name.
        返回:
        a document content.
